name: debug-solidity
description: Solidity library and related contracts for debugging contracts
author: alex@kern.io

scripts.watch: nodemon --exec 'yarn test || exit 1' -e js,sol --watch contracts/ --watch test/
scripts.gen-docs: solmd contracts/Debuggable.sol --dest API.md && cat README.template.md API.md > README.md

hooks.pre-commit: yarn gen-docs && git add API.md README.template.md README.md
